item.description:
Hi everyone,

This is a joint event with Social Fun. We will meet at Jammin Jarva, walk around Arlington and watch the fireworks from Spy Pond. We will probaly grab something to eat afterwards. My cell is
508-472-7900. parking is free along mass ave and route 60 (pleasant st). Hope you can make it!
item.how_to_find_us: look for the group right outside
item.name: Arlington Walk and Fireworks
